snippet: Beatlemania, a museum offering more than 1,000 Fab Four-related items, exhibitions, listening stations and plenty of kitsch, and situated on the Reeperbahn, where the band played some of its earliest shows, is unable to cover its operating costs and...
abstract: Beatlemania, a museum offering more than 1,000 Fab Four-related items, exhibitions, listening stations and plenty of kitsch, and situated on the Reeperbahn, where the band played some of its earliest shows, is unable to cover its operating costs and will close at the end of June.

headline.main: Beatles Museum in Hamburg is Kaput
headline.print_headline: Beatles Museum In Hamburg Is Kaput
